list.name: Default
list.comment: project in workable condition. Development will continue if new requirements are needed. Email now works, register fully works. Ensure you create a register and signature template file in the emails directory, add a logo.png file if you want a logo. Update the email address in the send email function in the scripts.php file, setup the database in the PDOHandler file. SQL table structures will be added later. only 2 tables required if you want to reverse engineer.
